author: Samuel Lovett, Samuel Lovett
title: Coronavirus: British national among four dead on virus-stricken cruise ship heading for Florida
description: More than 200 Britons aboard the Zaandam, which has been at sea since 15 March
content:
A coronavirus-stricken cruise ship embroiled in a dispute over plans to disembark passengers in the US has reported the deaths of four people, including one British national.
Two of the dead had tested positive for coronavirus, with a further nine people on … [+3163 chars]
